pa_indicators.description: service_offering.csat_score is measured daily as unit . The goal for this indicator is not set. It is the average on data source service_offering.csat_score, which is using the table: service_offering with the following conditions: CSAT score is anything
pa_indicators.name: service_offering.csat_score
